title: Ineos Grenadiers Downplays Brailsford Reports: ‘Nothing Really Changes’
content:
Ineos Grenadiers sport director says Brailsford remains closely involved in the WorldTour team: 'He is still in contact with us and involved in our successes and our structure.'

Read the full article at Ineos Grenadiers Downplays Brailsford Reports: ‘Nothing Really Changes’ on Velo.
author: ahood
